### NOTES:

1. Amount due to entities covered under Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises as defined in the Micro, Small, Medium Enterprises Development Act, 2006, have been identified on the basis of information available with the Company.

2. Ageing of the Supplier, along with any amount involved in disputes as required by Schedule III of Companies Act, 2013 is disclosed above from the date of 3. Trade Payables include amount of ₹ 202.88 Lakhs (March 31, 2024: ₹16.60 Lakhs, March 31, 2023: Nil) payable to related parties. (Refer Annexure 37)
4. There are no due or unbilled Trade Payables.
